1: <pb/><t>Inchin kub'sane' teya Nman Dyos</t> <t>kse'n inxi'x chin yajtiye':</t>
3: <pb/><t>Taye, Nman Dyos,</t> <t>noqwit min nik'tna'lju' qile' tu'na,</t> <t>¿alxi'xwitlokye kb'entel tkyajwe' twitza?</t>
5: <pb/><t>Inchin ayone' te Qman Dyos tuk'i'l tkyaqil nk'u'je',</t> <t>q'uqliwe' nk'u'j ti'ju' tyol.</t>
6: <t>Inxi'x chin ayonwe' ti'j Qman Dyos</t> <t>kyekywitzju' xq'uqil tnam.</t> <t>Kse'nqe' xq'uqil nche ayon tu'n qsqix,</t>
7: <t>ikxtzunkyeju'ye' aj Israel, che ayone' te Qman Dyos,</t> <t>tuk'i'l na'te ta'ju' tk'u'jlalil ex tzaqpib'l axxi'x.</t>
8: <t>¡Ate tzaqpilkye aj Israel te tkyaqilju' kyb'inchb'en myab'a'n! Chiju' b'itzal.</t>
